ComicInfo.Series: My Little Pony: Kenbucky Roller Derby
ComicInfo.Summary: Lace up your skates, everypony, we're heading to the Kenbucky Roller Derby! After getting rejected from the local roller derby team, Sunny sets out to form her own team. Thanks to self-appointed team manager Pipp and her ClipTrot sleuthing skills, they find the perfect pony to join them: Tracy Tailspin, retired derby legend! And she lives right in Maretime Bay! Tracy agrees to help on one condition: Sunny must complete a super-challenging skating obstacle course. But with her sights set on the Kenbucky Roller Derby, nothing can stand in her way!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-17 20:49:36. [CVDB1041355] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:15:50. [Issue ID 2600226]
ComicInfo.Characters: Zipp Storm,Pipp Petals,Argyle Starshine,Sunny Starscout,Izzy Moonbow,Tracy Tailspin,Misty Brightdawn
ComicInfo.Title: Kenbucky Roller Derby [Part 1]
